You can skip this lesson for now.

Come back again another time to complete it.

parameters.text: In the next screen, we will change a setting in your Simm notifications.

I will open the Notification settings screen for you.

Change the “Vibration” setting to “ON”, then use the back gesture to come back here.

Tap the button below to open Notification settings.

parameters.TextError:
Open Settings->Apps->Simm->Notifications

In notification settings screen, tap on the channel “Notification learning session”. Scroll down to “Vibration” setting and change it to “ON”.

parameters.text: Good work! You changed the notification setting.
